solution_line_template: The total number of hours that Rafael has worked by Tuesday is {tuesday_hours}+{monday_hours} = <<{tuesday_hours}+{monday_hours}={hours_worked_by_tuesday}>>{hours_worked_by_tuesday} hours.

To complete his assigned work hours, Rafael works {hours_left} hours more, making his total weekly hours to be {hours_worked_by_tuesday}+{hours_left} = <<{total_weekly_hours}={total_weekly_hours}>>{total_weekly_hours} hours.
Since he is paid ${pay_per_hour} per hour, he makes ${pay_per_hour}*{total_weekly_hours} = $<<{pay_per_hour}*{total_weekly_hours}={total_pay}>>{total_pay} a week.
